name: Burrows Of The Likwid DEMO
description:
Burrows of the Likwid, a platforming shoot em up based on musical instruments.

menu: W and S to navigate options and E to select an option

this is a game where you shoot things... i... idk how to explain it more...
its a song-based game where you shoot bad things and get chests and never win it is always endless for right now.

this is a demo build meaning all of these assets in this game are not at all finished assets nor final additions
